verses.verse: Blessed<WH835> are the undefiled<WH8549> in the way<WH1870>, who walk<WH1980> in the law<WH8451> of the Lord<WH3068>.
Blessed<WH835> are they that keep<WH5341> his testimonies<WH5713>, and that seek<WH1875> him with the whole heart<WH3820>.
They also do<WH6466> no iniquity<WH5766>: they walk<WH1980> in his ways<WH1870>.
You have commanded<WH6680> us to keep<WH8104> your precepts<WH6490> diligently<WH3966>.
O that<WH305> my ways<WH1870> were directed<WH3559> to keep<WH8104> your statutes<WH2706>!
Then shall I not be ashamed<WH954>, when I have respect<WH5027> unto all your commandments<WH4687>.
I will praise<WH3034> you with uprightness<WH3476> of heart<WH3824>, when I shall have learned<WH3925> your righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941>.
I will keep<WH8104> your statutes<WH2706>: O forsake<WH5800> me not utterly<WH3966>.
With what shall a young man<WH5288> cleanse<WH2135> his way<WH734>? by taking care<WH8104> according to your word<WH1697>.
With my whole heart<WH3820> have I sought<WH1875> you<WH7686>: O let me not wander from your commandments<WH4687>.
Your word<WH565> have I hid<WH6845> in my heart<WH3820>, that I might not sin against you<WH2398>.
Blessed<WH1288> are you<WH3068>, O Lord: teach<WH3925> me your statutes<WH2706>.
With my lips<WH8193> have I declared<WH5608> all the judgments<WH4941> of your mouth<WH6310>.
I have rejoiced<WH7797> in the way<WH1870> of your testimonies<WH5715>, as much as in<WH5921> all riches<WH1952>.
I will meditate<WH7878> in your precepts<WH6490>, and have respect<WH5027> unto your ways<WH734>.
I will delight<WH8173> myself in your statutes<WH2708>: I will not forget<WH7911> your word<WH1697>.
Deal bountifully<WH1580> with your servant<WH5650>, that I may live<WH2421>, and keep<WH8104> your word<WH1697>.
Open<WH1540> my eyes<WH5869>, that I may behold<WH5027> wondrous things<WH6381> out of your law<WH8451>.
I am a stranger<WH1616> in the earth<WH776>: hide<WH5641> not your commandments from me<WH4687>.
My soul<WH5315> breaks<WH1638> for the longing<WH8375> that it has unto your judgments<WH4941> at all times<WH6256>.
You have rebuked<WH1605> the proud<WH2086> that are cursed<WH779>, which do err<WH7686> from your commandments<WH4687>.
Remove<WH1556> from me reproach<WH2781> and contempt<WH937>; for I have kept<WH5341> your testimonies<WH5713>.
Princes<WH8269> also did sit<WH3427> and speak<WH1696> against me<WH5650>: but your servant did meditate<WH7878> in your statutes<WH2706>.
Your testimonies<WH5713> also are my delight<WH8191> and my counselors<WH582>.
My soul<WH5315> cleaves<WH1692> unto the dust<WH6083>: quicken<WH2421> you me according to your word<WH1697>.
I have declared<WH5608> my ways<WH1870>, and you heard<WH6030> me<WH3925>: teach me your statutes<WH2706>.
Make me to understand<WH995> the way<WH1870> of your precepts<WH6490>: so shall I talk<WH7878> of your wondrous works<WH6381>.
My soul<WH5315> melts<WH1811> for heaviness<WH8424>: strengthen<WH6965> you me according unto your word<WH1697>.
Remove<WH5493> from me the way<WH1870> of lying<WH8267>: and grant me your law<WH8451> graciously<WH2603>.
I have chosen<WH977> the way<WH1870> of truth<WH530>: your judgments<WH4941> have I laid before me<WH7737>.
I have stuck<WH1692> unto your testimonies<WH5715>: O Lord<WH3068>, put me not to shame<WH954>.
I will run<WH7323> the way<WH1870> of your commandments<WH4687>, when you shall enlarge<WH7337> my heart<WH3820>.
Teach<WH3384> me<WH3068>, O Lord, the way<WH1870> of your statutes<WH2706>; and I shall keep<WH5341> it unto the end<WH6118>.
Give me understanding<WH995>, and I shall keep<WH5341> your law<WH8451>; Yes<WH8104>, I shall observe it with my whole heart<WH3820>.
Make me to go<WH1869> in the path<WH5410> of your commandments<WH4687>; for in it do I delight<WH2654>.
Incline<WH5186> my heart<WH3820> unto your testimonies<WH5715>, and not to covetousness<WH1215>.
Turn away<WH5674> my eyes<WH5869> from beholding<WH7200> vanity<WH7723>; and quicken<WH2421> me in your ways<WH1870>.
Establish<WH6965> your word<WH565> unto your servant<WH5650>, who is devoted to your fear<WH3374>.
Turn away<WH5674> my reproach<WH2781> which I fear<WH3025>: for your judgments<WH4941> are good<WH2896>.
Behold<WH8373>, I have longed after your precepts<WH6490>: quicken<WH2421> me in your righteousness<WH6666>.
Let your mercies<WH2617> come<WH935> also unto me<WH3068>, O Lord, even your salvation<WH8668>, according to your word<WH565>.
So shall I have with which<WH1697> to answer<WH6030> him that blasphemes<WH2778> me<WH982>: for I trust in your word<WH1697>.
And take<WH5337> not the word<WH1697> of truth<WH571> utterly<WH3966> out of my mouth<WH6310>; for I have hoped<WH3176> in your judgments<WH4941>.
So shall I keep<WH8104> your law<WH8451> continually<WH8548> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.
And I will walk<WH1980> at liberty<WH7342>: for I seek<WH1875> your precepts<WH6490>.
I will speak<WH1696> of your testimonies<WH5713> also before kings<WH4428>, and will not be ashamed<WH954>.
And I will delight<WH8173> myself in your commandments<WH4687>, which I have loved<WH157>.
My hands<WH3709> also will I lift up<WH5375> unto your commandments<WH4687>, which I have loved<WH157>; and I will meditate<WH7878> in your statutes<WH2706>.
Remember<WH2142> the word<WH1697> unto your servant<WH5650>, upon which you have caused me to hope<WH3176>.
This is my comfort<WH5165> in my affliction<WH6040>: for your word<WH565> has quickened me<WH2421>.
The proud<WH2086> have had me greatly<WH3966> in derision<WH3887>: yet have I not declined<WH5186> from your law<WH8451>.
I remembered<WH2142> your judgments<WH4941> of old<WH5769>, O Lord<WH3068>; and have comforted myself<WH5162>.
Horror<WH2152> has taken hold<WH270> upon me because of the wicked<WH7563> that forsake<WH5800> your law<WH8451>.
Your statutes<WH2706> have been my songs<WH2158> in the house<WH1004> of my pilgrimage<WH4033>.
I have remembered<WH2142> your name<WH8034>, O Lord<WH3068>, in the night<WH3915>, and have kept<WH8104> your law<WH8451>.
This I had<WH5341>, because I kept your precepts<WH6490>.
You are my portion<WH2506>, O Lord<WH3068>: I have said<WH559> that I would keep<WH8104> your words<WH1697>.
I entreated<WH2470> your favor<WH6440> with my whole heart<WH3820>: be merciful<WH2603> unto me according to your word<WH565>.
I thought<WH2803> on my ways<WH1870>, and turned<WH7725> my feet<WH7272> unto your testimonies<WH5713>.
I made haste<WH2363>, and delayed<WH4102> not to keep<WH8104> your commandments<WH4687>.
The bands<WH2256> of the wicked<WH7563> have robbed<WH5749> me<WH7911>: but I have not forgotten your law<WH8451>.
At midnight<WH2676> I will rise<WH6965> to give thanks<WH3034> unto you because of your righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941>.
I am a companion<WH2270> of all them that fear<WH3372> you<WH8104>, and of them that keep your precepts<WH6490>.
The earth<WH776>, O Lord<WH3068>, is full<WH4390> of your mercy<WH2617>: teach<WH3925> me your statutes<WH2706>.
You have dealt<WH6213> well<WH2896> with your servant<WH5650>, O Lord<WH3068>, according unto your word<WH1697>.
Teach<WH3925> me good<WH2898> judgment<WH2940> and knowledge<WH1847>: for I have believed<WH539> your commandments<WH4687>.
Before I was afflicted<WH6031> I went astray<WH7683>: but now have I kept<WH8104> your word<WH565>.
You are good<WH2896>, and do good<WH2895>; teach<WH3925> me your statutes<WH2706>.
The proud<WH2086> have forged<WH2950> a lie<WH8267> against me<WH5341>: but I will keep your precepts<WH6490> with my whole heart<WH3820>.
Their heart<WH3820> is as fat<WH2954> as grease<WH2459>; but I delight<WH8173> in your law<WH8451>.
It is good<WH2896> for me that I have been afflicted<WH6031>; that I might learn<WH3925> your statutes<WH2706>.
The law<WH8451> of your mouth<WH6310> is better<WH2896> unto me than thousands<WH505> of gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701>.
Your hands<WH3027> have made<WH6213> me and fashioned<WH3559> me<WH995>: give me understanding, that I may learn<WH3925> your commandments<WH4687>.
They that fear<WH3373> you will be glad<WH8055> when they see<WH7200> me<WH3176>; because I have hoped in your word<WH1697>.
I know<WH3045>, O Lord<WH3068>, that your judgments<WH4941> are right<WH6664>, and that you in faithfulness<WH530> have afflicted me<WH6031>.
Let<WH2617>, I pray you, your merciful kindness be for my comfort<WH5162>, according to your word<WH565> unto your servant<WH5650>.
Let your tender mercies<WH7356> come<WH935> unto me<WH2421>, that I may live: for your law<WH8451> is my delight<WH8191>.
Let the proud<WH2086> be ashamed<WH954>; for they dealt perversely<WH5791> with me without a cause<WH8267>: but I will meditate<WH7878> in your precepts<WH6490>.
Let those that fear<WH3373> you turn<WH7725> unto me<WH3045>, and those that have known your testimonies<WH5713>.
Let my heart<WH3820> be sound<WH8549> in your statutes<WH2706>; that I be not ashamed<WH954>.
My soul<WH5315> faints<WH3615> for your salvation<WH8668>: but I hope<WH3176> in your word<WH1697>.
My eyes<WH5869> fail<WH3615> for your word<WH565>, saying<WH559>, When will you comfort me<WH5162>?
For I am become like a bottle<WH4997> in the smoke<WH7008>; yet do I not forget<WH7911> your statutes<WH2706>.
How many are the days<WH3117> of your servant<WH5650>? when will you execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> on them that persecute me<WH7291>?
The proud<WH2086> have dug<WH3738> pits<WH7882> for me<WH8451>, which are not after your law.
All your commandments<WH4687> are faithful<WH530>: they persecute<WH7291> me wrongfully<WH8267>; help you me<WH5826>.
They had almost<WH4592> consumed<WH3615> me upon earth<WH776>; but I forsook<WH5800> not your precepts<WH6490>.
Quicken<WH2421> me after your lovingkindness<WH2617>; so shall I keep<WH8104> the testimony<WH5715> of your mouth<WH6310>.
For ever<WH5769>, O Lord<WH3068>, your word<WH1697> is settled<WH5324> in heaven<WH8064>.
Your faithfulness<WH530> is unto all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>: you have established<WH3559> the earth<WH776>, and it stays<WH5975>.
They continue<WH5975> this day<WH3117> according to your ordinances<WH4941>: for all are your servants<WH5650>.
Unless<WH3884> your law<WH8451> had been my delights<WH8191>, I should then have perished<WH6> in my affliction<WH6040>.
I will never<WH5769> forget<WH7911> your precepts<WH6490>: for with them you have quickened me<WH2421>.
I am yours<WH3467>, save me<WH1875>; for I have sought your precepts<WH6490>.
The wicked<WH7563> have waited<WH6960> for me to destroy<WH6> me<WH995>: but I will consider your testimonies<WH5713>.
I have seen<WH7200> a end<WH7093> of all perfection<WH8502>: but your commandment<WH4687> is exceedingly<WH3966> broad<WH7342>.
O how love I<WH157> your law<WH8451>! it is my meditation<WH7881> all the day<WH3117>.
You through your commandments<WH4687> have made me wiser<WH2449> than my enemies<WH341>: for they are ever with me<WH5769>.
I have more understanding<WH7919> than all my teachers<WH3925>: for your testimonies<WH5715> are my meditation<WH7881>.
I understand<WH995> more than the ancients<WH2205>, because I keep<WH5341> your precepts<WH6490>.
I have refrained<WH3607> my feet<WH7272> from every evil<WH7451> way<WH734>, that I might keep<WH8104> your word<WH1697>.
I have not departed<WH5493> from your judgments<WH4941>: for you have taught me<WH3384>.
How sweet<WH4452> are your words<WH565> unto my taste<WH2441>! Yes<WH1706>, sweeter than honey to my mouth<WH6310>!
Through your precepts<WH6490> I get understanding<WH995>: therefore I hate<WH8130> every false<WH8267> way<WH734>.
Your word<WH1697> is a lamp<WH5216> unto my feet<WH7272>, and a light<WH216> unto my path<WH5410>.
I have sworn<WH7650>, and I will perform<WH6965> it<WH8104>, that I will keep your righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941>.
I am afflicted<WH6031> very much<WH3966>: quicken<WH2421> me<WH3068>, O Lord, according unto your word<WH1697>.
Accept<WH7521>, I beg you<WH5071>, the freewill offerings of my mouth<WH6310>, O Lord<WH3068>, and teach<WH3925> me your judgments<WH4941>.
My soul<WH5315> is continually<WH8548> in my hand<WH3709>: yet do I not forget<WH7911> your law<WH8451>.
The wicked<WH7563> have laid<WH5414> a snare<WH6341> for me<WH8582>: yet I erred not from your precepts<WH6490>.
Your testimonies<WH5715> have I taken as a heritage<WH5157> for ever<WH5769>: for they are the rejoicing<WH8342> of my heart<WH3820>.
I have inclined<WH5186> my heart<WH3820> to perform<WH6213> your statutes<WH2706> always<WH5769>, even unto the end<WH6118>.
I hate<WH8130> vain thoughts<WH5588>: but your law<WH8451> do I love<WH157>.
You are my hiding place<WH5643> and my shield<WH4043>: I hope<WH3176> in your word<WH1697>.
Depart<WH5493> from me<WH7489>, you evildoers: for I will keep<WH5341> the commandments<WH4687> of my God<WH430>.
Uphold<WH5564> me according unto your word<WH565>, that I may live<WH2421>: and let me not be ashamed<WH954> of my hope<WH7664>.
Hold you me up<WH5582>, and I shall be safe<WH3467>: and I will have respect<WH8159> unto your statutes<WH2706> continually<WH8548>.
You have trodden down<WH5541> all them that err<WH7686> from your statutes<WH2706>: for their deceit<WH8649> is falsehood<WH8267>.
You set away<WH7673> all the wicked<WH7563> of the earth<WH776> like dross<WH5509>: therefore I love<WH157> your testimonies<WH5713>.
My flesh<WH1320> trembles<WH5568> for fear<WH6343> of you<WH3372>; and I am afraid of your judgments<WH4941>.
I have done<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and justice<WH6664>: leave<WH3240> me not to my oppressors<WH6231>.
Be sure<WH6148> for your servant<WH5650> for good<WH2896>: let not the proud<WH2086> oppress me<WH6231>.
My eyes<WH5869> fail<WH3615> for your salvation<WH3444>, and for the word<WH565> of your righteousness<WH6664>.
Deal<WH6213> with your servant<WH5650> according unto your mercy<WH2617>, and teach<WH3925> me your statutes<WH2706>.
I am your servant<WH5650>; give me understanding<WH995>, that I may know<WH3045> your testimonies<WH5713>.
It is time<WH6256> for you<WH3068>, Lord, to work<WH6213>: for they have made void<WH6565> your law<WH8451>.
Therefore I love<WH157> your commandments<WH4687> above gold<WH2091>; Yes<WH6337>, above fine gold.
Therefore I esteem all your precepts<WH6490> concerning all things to be right<WH3474>; and I hate<WH8130> every false<WH8267> way<WH734>.
Your testimonies<WH5715> are wonderful<WH6382>: therefore does my soul<WH5315> keep them<WH5341>.
The entrance<WH6608> of your words<WH1697> gives light<WH215>; it gives understanding<WH995> unto the simple<WH6612>.
I opened<WH6473> my mouth<WH6310>, and panted<WH7602>: for I longed<WH2968> for your commandments<WH4687>.
Look<WH6437> you upon me<WH2603>, and be merciful unto me<WH4941>, as you usest to do unto those that love<WH157> your name<WH8034>.
Order<WH3559> my steps<WH6471> in your word<WH565>: and let not any iniquity<WH205> have dominion over me<WH7980>.
Deliver<WH6299> me from the oppression<WH6233> of man<WH120>: so will I keep<WH8104> your precepts<WH6490>.
Make your face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> upon your servant<WH5650>; and teach<WH3925> me your statutes<WH2706>.
Rivers<WH6388> of waters<WH4325> run down<WH3381> my eyes<WH5869>, because they keep<WH8104> not your law<WH8451>.
Righteous<WH6662> are you<WH3068>, O Lord, and upright<WH3477> are your judgments<WH4941>.
Your testimonies<WH5713> that you have commanded<WH6680> are righteous<WH6664> and very<WH3966> faithful<WH530>.
My zeal<WH7068> has consumed<WH6789> me<WH6862>, because my enemies have forgotten<WH7911> your words<WH1697>.
Your word<WH565> is very<WH3966> pure<WH6884>: therefore your servant<WH5650> loves it<WH157>.
I am small<WH6810> and despised<WH959>: yet do not I forget<WH7911> your precepts<WH6490>.
Your righteousness<WH6666> is a everlasting<WH5769> righteousness<WH6664>, and your law<WH8451> is the truth<WH571>.
Trouble<WH6862> and anguish<WH4689> have taken hold<WH4672> on me<WH4687>: yet your commandments are my delights<WH8191>.
The righteousness<WH6664> of your testimonies<WH5715> is everlasting<WH5769>: give me understanding<WH995>, and I shall live<WH2421>.
I cried<WH7121> with my whole heart<WH3820>; hear<WH6030> me<WH3068>, O Lord: I will keep<WH5341> your statutes<WH2706>.
I cried<WH7121> unto you<WH3467>; save me<WH8104>, and I shall keep your testimonies<WH5713>.
I prevented<WH6923> the dawning of the morning<WH5399>, and cried<WH7768>: I hoped<WH3176> in your word<WH1697>.
My eyes<WH5869> meet<WH6923> the night watches<WH821>, that I might meditate<WH7878> in your word<WH565>.
Hear<WH8085> my voice<WH6963> according unto your lovingkindness<WH2617>: O Lord<WH3068>, quicken<WH2421> me according to your judgment<WH4941>.
They draw near<WH7126> that follow<WH7291> after mischief<WH2154>: they are far<WH7368> from your law<WH8451>.
You are near<WH7138>, O Lord<WH3068>; and all your commandments<WH4687> are truth<WH571>.
Concerning your testimonies<WH5713>, I have known<WH3045> of old<WH6924> that you have founded<WH3245> them for ever<WH5769>.
Consider<WH7200> my affliction<WH6040>, and deliver<WH2502> me<WH7911>: for I do not forget your law<WH8451>.
Plead<WH7378> my cause<WH7379>, and deliver<WH1350> me<WH2421>: quicken me according to your word<WH565>.
Salvation<WH3444> is far<WH7350> from the wicked<WH7563>: for they seek<WH1875> not your statutes<WH2706>.
Great<WH7227> are your tender mercies<WH7356>, O Lord<WH3068>: quicken<WH2421> me according to your judgments<WH4941>.
Many<WH7227> are my persecutors<WH7291> and my enemies<WH6862>; yet do I not decline<WH5186> from your testimonies<WH5715>.
I looked<WH7200> the transgressors<WH898>, and was grieved<WH6962>; because they kept<WH8104> not your word<WH565>.
Consider<WH7200> how I love<WH157> your precepts<WH6490>: quicken<WH2421> me<WH3068>, O Lord, according to your lovingkindness<WH2617>.
Your word<WH1697> is true<WH571> from the beginning<WH7218>: and every one of your righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941> endures for ever<WH5769>.
Princes<WH8269> have persecuted<WH7291> me without a cause<WH2600>: but my heart<WH3820> stands in awe<WH6342> of your word<WH1697>.
I rejoice<WH7797> at your word<WH565>, as one that finds<WH4672> great<WH7227> plunder<WH7998>.
I hate<WH8130> and abhor<WH8581> lying<WH8267>: but your law<WH8451> do I love<WH157>.
Seven times<WH7651> a day<WH3117> do I praise<WH1984> you because of your righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941>.
Great<WH7227> peace<WH7965> have they which love<WH157> your law<WH8451>: and nothing shall offend them<WH4383>.
Lord<WH3068>, I have hoped<WH7663> for your salvation<WH3444>, and done<WH6213> your commandments<WH4687>.
My soul<WH5315> has kept<WH8104> your testimonies<WH5713>; and I love<WH157> them exceedingly<WH3966>.
I have kept<WH8104> your precepts<WH6490> and your testimonies<WH5713>: for all my ways are before you<WH1870>.
Let my cry<WH7440> come near<WH7126> before<WH6440> you<WH3068>, O Lord: give me understanding<WH995> according to your word<WH1697>.
Let my supplication<WH8467> come<WH935> before<WH6440> you<WH5337>: deliver me according to your word<WH565>.
My lips<WH8193> shall utter<WH5042> praise<WH8416>, when you have taught<WH3925> me your statutes<WH2706>.
My tongue<WH3956> shall speak<WH6030> of your word<WH565>: for all your commandments<WH4687> are righteousness<WH6664>.
Let your hand<WH3027> help<WH5826> me<WH977>; for I have chosen your precepts<WH6490>.
I have longed<WH8373> for your salvation<WH3444>, O Lord<WH3068>; and your law<WH8451> is my delight<WH8191>.
Let my soul<WH5315> live<WH2421>, and it shall praise<WH1984> you<WH4941>; and let your judgments help me<WH5826>.
I have gone astray<WH8582> like a lost<WH6> sheep<WH7716>; seek<WH1245> your servant<WH5650>; for I do not forget<WH7911> your commandments<WH4687>.
